## Welcome to my GitHub Pages.
I have been working with Android development since 2012 helping different organizations, through all the steps in the life cycle of Software Application Development, and Management. My goal is to help organizations with my skills, experience and ability to learn.

## Links to Android code samples, created with Android Studio 1.1.0:

#     [**Espresso Testing**](http://wrondon.github.io/AppWithEspresso)

#     [**Firebase**](http://wrondon.github.io/AppTestFirebase)

#     [**Parse**](http://wrondon.github.io/TodoListActivity)

#     [**RecyclerView and Volley] (http://wrondon.github.io/TestImages)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
